comments.comment:
Victor Ratnayake kawadawath hinawela godak santhoshayen katha krana knek nowe. Bohoma tharaha adambararayakin uthu charithayak kiyai  ma sithuwe. May video eke dakka  sinahawa pitipasa  sitinne  ohuge deweni manamaliya nam e  gaurawa  ayata himiwiya uthui. kisi kenek dukbarawa thanikadawa miya ya uthu naha. Kohoma jivath unath minissu katha hadana eka walakwanna baha. Mama Victor Ratnayake kalakaruwa paudgalikawa hadunana kenek nowe, aurudu gaanakata pera prasangayakadi ohu samaga chayarrupayakata peni sitiya. Dharuwo sitiyata ada kiyen kee denada demaupiyawa balaganne? Ada hama denama awiweki  jeevitha gatha kranne, Arthika prasna nisa demaupiyanwa magaharenawa, swaminwahansela mona bana keuwath ada arthikaya sama prasnayakatama mul wela, minissu amanussayan wela salli hoyagenama duwanawa. Lamainge jeevitha tution panthi wala. Wayasaka demaipiyan gedara kotu wela, thani wela., katha kranna knek nathuwa.
 Demapiyan daruwanta yatathwa jeewath viya uthu naha  mehema hari katawath karadarayak nowi jeevath wenna puluwannam!  Mohuta jeevath wanna mudal thiyenawa, ithin balaganna biridak gathtata eke thiyena warada mkakda?  May vivahaya arthika vasi walin thora  sathya premaya pera darikota unu siduweemk nam ape subha pathum!
comments.author: indigo franka

replies.replyComment: wadakaara kamata hari awilla inne kamaththen neda, ehema  nam badinna oneth naha neda, puluwan nam bahutharayak oya dema karawi, bari aya katha hadawi.
